verses.verse: O <S%H1980>come,<s%> let us <S%H7442>sing<s%> for <S%H7442>joy<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> Let us <S%H7321>shout<s%> <S%H7321>joyfully<s%> to the <S%H6697>rock<s%> of our <S%H3468>salvation.<s%>
Let us <S%H6923>come<s%> <S%H6923>before<s%> His <S%H6440>presence<s%> with <S%H8426>thanksgiving;<s%> Let us <S%H7321>shout<s%> <S%H7321>joyfully<s%> to Him with <S%H2158>psalms.<s%>
For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H410>God,<s%> And a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%>
In <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> are the <S%H4278>depths<s%> of the <S%H776>earth;<s%> The <S%H8443>peaks<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> are His also.
The <S%H3220>sea<s%> is His, for it was He who <S%H6213>made<s%> it; And His <S%H3027>hands<s%> <S%H3335>formed<s%> the <S%H3006>dry<s%> <S%H3006>land.<s%>
<S%H935>Come,<s%> let us <S%H7812>worship<s%> and <S%H3766>bow<s%> <S%H3766>down;<s%> Let us <S%H1288>kneel<s%> <S%H6923>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H6213>Maker.<s%>

For He is our <S%H430>God,<s%> And we are the <S%H5971>people<s%> of His <S%H4830>pasture,<s%> and the <S%H6629>sheep<s%> of His <S%H3027>hand.<s%> <S%H3117>Today,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> you would <S%H8085>hear<s%> His <S%H6963>voice,<s%>
Do not <S%H7185>harden<s%> your <S%H3824>hearts,<s%> as at <S%H4809>Meribah,<s%> As in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H4532>Massah<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness;<s%>
<S%H834>"When<s%> your fathers <S%H1>tested<s%> Me, They <S%H5254>tried<s%> Me, <S%H974>though<s%> they had <S%H1571>seen<s%> My <S%H7200>work.<s%>

"For <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> I <S%H6962>loathed<s%> [that] <S%H1755>generation,<s%> And <S%H559>said<s%> they are a <S%H5971>people<s%> who <S%H8582>err<s%> in their <S%H3824>heart,<s%> And they do not <S%H3045>know<s%> My <S%H1870>ways.<s%>
<S%H834>"Therefore<s%> I <S%H7650>swore<s%> in My <S%H639>anger,<s%> <S%H518>Truly<s%> they shall not <S%H935>enter<s%> into My <S%H4496>rest.<s%>"
